How to use the dumpgenerator? Here we explain it.

Remember you always can see the inline help with _--help_ parameter.

*What kind of backups there are?*

There are XML dumps and image dumps.

*How can I make a XML backup?*

If you have server access, use this http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:DumpBackup.php

If you have no server access, then use our dump generator. If the wiki you want to backup has API, use this:
  * python dumpgenerator.py --api=http://yourdomain.com/path/to/api.php --xml

If API is not available, then use this:
  * python dumpgenerator.py --index=http://yourdomain.com/path/to/index.php --xml
